subject: $500 in Concert Tickets for shoppersavingsenter.net@speedy.uwaterloo.ca (Participation required)
body:
Hello  , 

You have been selected to receive $500 worth of Concert Tickets to the concert 
of your choice for free (Participation required. See below for details.)

*** Confirm your e-mail address and follow the instructions 
on our website to get started. 
http://rustypromdress.com/c/894705/opytzwx27:fzomttrsuXCKarpoqqv00XCKasvspp1  


Sincerely, 
Rewards Team 



To unsubscribe from future advertisements from YourLiveConcertPass.net, 
go to: 	

I-DealDirect, Inc. | 27 North Wacker Drive, Suite 623 | Chicago, IL 60606

To receive the incentive gift you must: 1) register with valid information; 
2) complete the user survey; 3) complete at least 2 Silver, 2 Gold and 2 
Platinum offers; and 4) refer 1 unique household(s) that also complete these 
requirements. Purchase may be required. Please read website Terms & Conditions 
for details. Upon completion of all requirements, we will ship the incentive 
gift to you with free shipping.

YourLiveConcertPass.net is an independent rewards program for consumers and 
is not affiliated with, sponsored by or endorsed by any of the listed products 
or retailers. Trademarks, service marks, logos, and/or domain names (including, 
without limitation, the individual names of products and retailers) are the 
property of their respective owners.  

Copyright 2006 YourLiveConcertPass.net. All rights reserved. 




No longer wish to be on this list, just send a reply email.



Please send comments and inquiries to

Middletown, DE 19709
